abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews movie I Am Not a Serial Killer, directed by Billy O’Brien and starring Max Records.

keywords.value: I Am Not a Serial Killer (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: This adaptation of a Dan Wells novel features a 16-year-old protagonist with sociopathic tendencies trying to solve murders in his small town.

headline.main: Review: ‘I Am Not a Serial Killer,’ but Somebody Is
